defitem.label: Processed by: Hannah Bochain, Student Assistant and Kira A. Dietz, Archivist,

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Bridges & Sanders, New River Nursery Receipt, 1874
did.abstract: The collections contains a receipt for D. S. Peirce dated September 18, 1874, for the purchase of apples from the New River Nursery in Jackson's Ferry, Wythe County, Va.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Bridges & Sanders, New River Nursery Receipt must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Bridges & Sanders, New River Nursery Receipt, Ms2013-051, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Bridges & Sanders, New River Nursery Receipt was purchased by Special Collections in April 2013.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Bridges & Sanders, New River Nursery Receipt was completed in August 2013.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collections contains a receipt for D. S. Pierce dated September 18, 1874 for the purchase of apples from the New River Nursery in Jackson's Ferry, Wythe County, Va. It includes handwritten notes for amounts purchased, as well as notes about payment on the back.
